cells.data:
## Purpose

Isolating insert for gibson assembly from the montium species.

## Samples 

25 ul each, but ran in three wells, so I had a total of 75ul per sample. I learned that when the PCR sample is run at 50ul the sample may not be evenly heated, so you get smearing. Huh. Who knew?

primers:
cm_A_Gibs_F1	cgtcttcaagaattcgtttGTTACCCGGTAMTGCATAAC
cm_A_Gib_R1	 CAGGAATCGGAAACTTTAAGTTGCTGGGACTTAATTTG

1.) D. melanogastor
2.) D. rufa

## Program

Samples 2-9

step	temp	time
1	95	30 sec
2	95	15 sec
3	65	1 min
4	72	2 min
5	72	1 min
6	4	hold

Cycles = 29

## Results 
![Screen Shot 2016-11-11 at 10.09.40 AM.png](quiver-image-url/2975056817E0F624669448FEB697D7C4.png)


Concentrations from nano drop after cleaning

1. 70.3 ng/ul
2. 76.9 ng/ul
